summary: My first ever mod for Skyrim, New Sword i made it is a 1 handed beast
descriptionHtml:
This is the first ever mod i have made for Skyrim while im tinkering and geting into all the tools needed please download it and give it a try its a 1 handed beast named the Sword of Salvation it can be created at a forge and should be fully upgradeable, should be usuable with NMM but if you have probs jus download it manually, extract from the zip then just drop into your main skyrim data folder and activate the ESP, you can also find it by Hommingbrew Meadery by the river in a tree stump look in pics for map location... please leave any feedback and suggestions as i said this is my first ever mod and all input would be much appreciated.

No Special Requirements needed
No DLC's Needed
author: BongOfWar

files.name: Sword Of Salvation Reworked
files.changelogHtml:
Shorter blade
UV map completely remade from scrach
retuxtured to hopefully a better finish
